CustomField.description: Controls audit trail creation for synchronous one-shot AI actions invoked via FunctionAgentActionService (LWC/Flow). This setting ONLY affects Function-type agents. Conversational and batch agent executions always use full auditing regardless of this setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls audit trail depth for synchronous AI actions: • None: No audit records (maximum performance for high-volume use cases) • Minimal: Execution record only (basic tracking with executionId) • Standard: Execution + Steps with token metrics (recommended for production) • Full: Complete audit trail including decision steps for storyboard visualization
CustomField.label: Sync Action Audit Level
